data.title: 2yrs x 4.000M (OTT)
data.meta_description: David Perron signed a 2 year, $8,000,000 contract with the Ottawa Senators on Jul. 1, 2024. The contract has a cap hit of $4,000,000.
data.text:
David Perron signed a 2 year, $8,000,000 contract with the Ottawa Senators on Jul. 1, 2024. The contract has a cap hit of $4,000,000.

David Perron signed a 2 year, $9,500,000 contract with the Detroit Red Wings on Jul. 13, 2022. The contract has a cap hit of $4,750,000.

David Perron signed a 4 year, $16,000,000 contract with the St. Louis Blues on Jul. 1, 2018. The contract has a cap hit of $4,000,000.

David Perron signed a 2 year, $7,500,000 contract with the St. Louis Blues on Jul. 1, 2016. The contract has a cap hit of $3,750,000.

David Perron signed a 4 year, $15,250,000 contract with the St. Louis Blues on Jul. 5, 2012. The contract has a cap hit of $3,812,500.

David Perron signed a 2 year, $4,300,000 contract with the St. Louis Blues on Jul. 21, 2010. The contract has a cap hit of $2,150,000.
